works.description:
Our site was hacked. The hackers used 301 redirects (permanente redirects), and they were pointing to:
http://noboatno.atwebpages.com
http://alvaronoboa.atwebpages.com

They copied the whole site. Structure, images, content, text, everything.

They are attempting to gain access to the search engine rankings. And delete web results from the Internet.

When searching for "Alvaro Noboa" under the Google.com (Websearch, English, USA), 2 of our pages have dissapeared:
- http://www.alvaronoboa.com/Eng/AlvaroNoboaMision.htm (used to be 4th result on page 1)
http://www.alvaronoboa.com/indexEng.htm (used to be 3rd result on page 1).

Now, the ATWEBPAGES (hacked versions) rank on 2nd and 3rd page with:
alvaronoboa.atwebpages.com/Eng/AlvaroNoboaMission.htm
alvaronoboa.atwebpages.com/indexEng.htm

They are not only using copyrighted material. They are attempting to steal search ranking, and deface the content when the opportunity arises.
